players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly among us. We need to look for inconsistencies in people's stories today."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "I urge everyone to vote for Bob. My investigation confirmed he is mafia. We must eliminate him now to win."
Bob: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso. We must vote Diana out to win."
